SGCCRfC Wiki

Scientific Databases

Open-access datasets across geoscience, physics, climate, remote sensing, and more.

üåç Earth & Geoscience

USGS Earthquake Catalog

  • https://earthquake.usgs.gov/earthquakes/map
  • Global real-time earthquake data.

IRIS DMC

  • https://ds.iris.edu/ds/nodes/dmc
  • Seismic waveforms, metadata, and products.

üõ∞ Remote Sensing

NASA EarthData

  • https://earthdata.nasa.gov
  • MODIS, VIIRS, Landsat, climate reanalysis, etc.

ESA Copernicus Open Access Hub

  • https://scihub.copernicus.eu
  • Free Sentinel satellite data.

üì° GNSS / Geodesy

UNAVCO Data Archive

  • https://www.unavco.org
  • Raw GNSS, derived products, strain, and fault motion.

International GNSS Service (IGS)

  • https://igs.org
  • Global GNSS stations & precise ephemerides.

üå° Climate / Atmospheric Science

NOAA Climate Data Store

  • https://www.ncei.noaa.gov
  • Temperature, precipitation, atmospheric composition, ENSO.

ECMWF ERA5

  • https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu
  • Global climate reanalysis datasets.

üß™ Chemistry / Physics

NIST Chemistry WebBook

  • https://webbook.nist.gov
  • Thermochemical and spectroscopic data.

End of section.
